SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Represents an action made in the Splendor game.
ActionManager
Manages the move discovery, selection, and propagation of moves made by specific players in specific game sessions.
AuthTokenAuthenticator
Static utility class intended to authenticate user tokens during token restricted actions.
Card
Represents a Splendor Card with id, prestige, tokenBonus, deckType, discount and cost This class implements the Flyweight design pattern.
CardCost
Immutable container holding the costs associated with one card.
CardStatus
Status of a Splendor Card.
City
Represents a Splendor Cities expansion City with required prestige and gem amount to obtain the city.
CoatOfArms
Represents a Splendor Trading Posts expansion Coat of Arms with color type.
CoatOfArmsPile
Represents a Splendor Trading Posts expansion Coat of Arms pile with Coat of Arms and type.
CoatOfArmsType
Type of coat of arms.
Deck
Represents a Splendor Deck with cards, color, tokenBonus, cardType, discount and cost.
DeckJson
Enables the creation of a stripped down deck for transmission to client.
DeckType
Type of Card.
GameBoard
Model of the gameboard.
GameBoardJson
Facilitates the creation of a stripped down gameboard for transmission to client.
GameNotFoundException
Exception that is thrown when a game cannot be found.
GameRestController
GameRestController.
GameServiceAccountJson
GameServiceAccountJson.
GameServiceJson
GameServiceJson.
IllegalGameStateException
IllegalGameStateException for when unexpected game behaviour happens.
InventoryJson
Facilitates the creation of a stripped down user inventory json.
Launcher
Launches spring application.
LoadDatabase
Preliminary processing of the repository.
LocalGameStorage
Manages and stores the game instances locally.
Move
Represents a move with the action a player made, the card that was purchased/reserved (if any) and the username of the player.
MoveInfo
 
Noble
Represents a Splendor Noble with reserved status and prestige.
NobleStatus
Status of a Splendor Noble.
OrientCard
Represents an Orient expansion development card in Splendor.
PlayerWrapper
Flyweight PlayerWrapper.
Power
Represents a Splendor Trading Posts expansion Power.
SessionInfo
Encapsulates the session info which is populated upon session startup when request received from the lobby service.
SplendorGame
SplendorGame object which keeps track of all game info including the session info, game id, the turn manage, and the game board.
TerminalGameStateManager
Static class to provide utility in determining if the current state of a game board is in fact a terminal one in which case the round will finish until the next persons turn would be the creator of the session ie the starting player.
Token
Represents a Splendor Token with type.
TokenAuthenticationException
Provides exception for error caught while authenticating a user and their access token.
TokenBonusAmount
Amount of token bonus a card has.
TokenPile
Represents a Splendor Token Pile with tokens and type.
TokenType
Type of Token.
TradingPostSlot
Represents a Splendor Trading Posts expansion Trading Post slot with coat of arm slots and powers.
TurnManager
Take turn functionality.
UserInventory
Represents the inventory of a Splendor player.
